1.content:
You mutter to yourself as you climb onto the yellow school bus. It's too darn early in the morning to be awake.

It could be worse, you suppose. You didn't want to go off to college right away, so you grabbed a job at the school bus company in town -- doing light maintenance, tune-ups, that sort of thing. Today you're going to tighten a loose seat on a bus. But that takes almost none of your time. Most of your day you get to hang out and surf the internet, and hope that nothing goes wrong with any of the busses. And most days, nothing does go wrong.

Still, you have to be to work at five in the morning, and that's annoying -- especially when you were partying with friends the night before.

You groan as you aim your flashlight at the seat in question, about halfway to the back. Nothing that tricky -- just lost a couple bolts. You figured as much, and you quickly set to work ratcheting new ones into place. It takes about ten minutes, nothing that tough. Sliding the wrench into your pocket, you flick off the flashlight and prepare to head back in.

But something catches your eye as you return the bus to darkness. It's nothing you'd usually notice, but there's a faint glow coming from a bench seat. You get back onto your hands and knees, and see a small, glowing green disc, about the size of a quarter.

"That's weird," you mutter, reaching for it. Must be something like a glowstick, you think, as you....

Suddenly, you aren't thinking. You'd be screaming in agony, but you can't do that, either. You can't do anything, but watch in horror as the green light suddenly spreads rapidly over your arm, covering it in what looks like green glowing skin. The skin moves over your body, and then suddenly, you feel it work its way up your face.

You do not have time to process anything beyond the glow that fills your world. You pass out.

* * *

There is a distant rumbling, like thunder.

You groan. You rub your head, and look down at your watch. Seven in the morning! You stagger to your feet. You've been out for an hour and a half! There was the green light, and then....

You stop. This isn't right at all.

You were on the bus. But this can't be a bus. You're standing in a wide green corridor; giant buildings line the sides. And yet, you realize to your horror, they are instantly familiar.

The buidlings are the bench seats of the school bus.

Suddenly, the world lurches. You slide some distance before you're able to brace yourself against one of the bench legs. The school bus is rolling out!

This isn't good. You search your mind to remember which bus you're on. Some buses pick up elementary school kids first, some pick up middle schoolers first. The high schoolers start later. You realize that your bus is on its way to pick up....
1.title: An Unusual Morning

choices: Go for the backpack

11.content:
That's right -- this bus is going to pick up the elementary kids. You shudder. You're not sure that this is a good thing. You can't be more than half an inch tall -- tiny, so tiny you'll have a hard time being seen. You're going to need help, but can you trust a kid to help you?

Your thoughts are shelved as the bus rumbles to a stop. You watch the front as the doors open, and suddenly, the largest creature you've ever seen strides into view.

The enormous little girl stretches into the sky. She yawns, and flops into a seat a few rows ahead of you. She's followed by a couple boys, who pass you, shaking the ground with each step as they head toward the back of the bus.

A few stops later, and the seat above you gets a couple occupants. Two enormous boys settle down, the seat groaning with the strain of holding them. They look to be second- or third-graders, you think. You see one of them drop a school bag on the floor. You could approach them, you suppose, though all you can see of them is two pairs of battered tennis shoes, and some jeans.

At the next stop, you get another option. A fourth- or fifth-grade girl sits down in the seat behind yours. You actually get a good look at her -- she's wearing a skirt and Mary Janes. She's vaguely staring out the window, but she's set her lunch bag on the floor.

You have a couple options, the way you see it. You could try to get into the boy's backpack -- it's sitting right there. Or you could try to climb into the girl's lunch.

Then again, more kids are always coming. You'd better be careful.

12.content:
That's right -- this bus is going to pick up the middle school students. Well, better than elementary kids, you think, although you quickly realize you don't know why you think that.

You look around you. You can't be more than half an inch tall -- tiny, so tiny you'll have a hard time being seen. You're going to need help, but can you trust a middle school student to help you?

Your thoughts are shelved as the bus rumbles to a stop. You watch the front as the doors open, and suddenly, the largest creature you've ever seen strides into view.

The enormous girl stretches into the sky. She yawns, and flops into a seat a few rows ahead of you. She's followed by a couple boys, who pass you, shaking the ground with each step as they head toward the back of the bus.

A few stops later, and the seat above you gets a couple occupants. Two enormous boys settle down, the seat groaning with the strain of holding them. You see one of them drop a school bag on the floor. You could approach them, you suppose, though all you can see of them is two pairs of battered tennis shoes, and some jeans.

At the next stop, you get another option. A girl sits down in the seat behind yours. You actually get a good look at her -- she's wearing ballet flats and leggings, and a longish blouse. She's vaguely staring out the window.

You have a couple options, the way you see it. You could try to get into the boy's backpack -- it's sitting right there. Or you could try to climb onto the girl.

Or you could just wait. When the middle school run is done, this bus will pick up high school students. They'll be older, and more mature. Maybe you should wait for them.

The shoes are black, with the letters DC stamped on both sides of the heel and on the outside of the tongue of the shoe, the soles are a bright shade of red. The outside looks harmless enough, can't be that dangerous in a pair of shoes since the boy already has a pair on that he's obviously wearing to school. However you don’t have much time to mull it over in your head, as the boy absentmindedly begins to pull out the skate shoes while talking to his blonde haired friend, you leap inside the left one. As the boy pulls them out however, they become tilted with the toe section pointing downward, you roll and tumble across the obviously well worn and soggy insole until you hit the end of the shoe.

The boy had obviously worn these either recently, or he has worn them so much and so long while he was skateboarding with his pals. Because the stench of 12 year old boyfeet has been pungent and strong ever since you first landed in the shoe, its merely became ten times stronger now that you’re trapped in the much more sticky and wet toe section.
You are thrown around violently, nearly getting a concussion in the process as you bump your head on the spongy walls, as the 7th grader carelessly drops the skate shoes onto the bus floor. You hear him and his buddy giggling, the other boy saying something to the effect of: “Oh man! You’re gonna take your shoes off here!? I better pinch my nose shut!”

Harmless teasing to these boys, but a horrifying proclamation to you, that’s when you see them: Five dirty sock covered toes wiggling into the shoe you occupy’s opening. Your world shifts again and you know that the young man has picked up the shoe to make sure it goes on nice and tight. The toes ram you into the wall and pin you underneath them, the smell has never been as intense as it is now as the boy’s heel thuds down and he ties up the laces, never suspecting that the man who he has to thank for his ride to school today, is trapped underneath him.

124.content:
You have wondered too far from the pillary you were using to stabilize yourself. The bus comes to a stop and you loose your footing, tumbling forward and coming to a stop near the shoes of the two 12 year old boys sitting in the seat above you. For a few seconds you are so terrified you cannot even move, but you decide you need to assess your situation if you are to survive.

The boy closest to the window is wearing an extremely tattered pair of slip-on Vans. They were very dirty, but you guessed they were probably white when they were new. There was a ring of mud around the outsoles, which meant he must have stepped in a mud puddle on his way to the bus stop. His legs were slender, but muscular and tanned from skating all summer long before school started a few weeks ago. On his right ankle was an anklet in the school's colors, red and black, made from two pieces of thick string woven together. His feet were very restless. When he wasn't tapping his feet, he was slipping his sockless bare feet in and out of his Vans. When he slips his feet out, he reveals silky smoth feet, at the ends of which are ten long, perfectly proportioned toes, with surprisingly well-maintained toenails. Unfortunately, his feet didn't smell nearly as nice as they looked. Every time he removes his shoes, the stench of rancid foot sweat pervades your senses

The boy closest to the aisle was also wearing shorts and had tanned legs, but they were thicker and more muscular, and there was alot more hair. You guessed this boy must be at least a year older, and probably farther along the road to manhood. This boy was wearing a pair of etnies skate shoes, which were solid black except for an intricate green pattern on the fabric around his heel. This boy moves his feet much less than his slightly younger friend. The only movement is the slight bobbing of his heel. You can see that he is wearing black ankle socks, because a small amount of the black fabric peaks out over the tops of his sneakers.

You can hear the boys are busy discussing all the things that make boys their age happy. Video games and skateboarding are the topics of choice, with an occasional mention of nerf guns. As their conversation goes on, you hear that the boy near the window, with the white vans, is named Logan, and the boy near the aisle with the black Etnies is named Hunter.

You decide they sound innocent enough that they are likely to give you help, but you have to decide which boy you want to approach first.
124.title: Your choice is made for you.

1241.content:
You decide to approach Logan, the boy with the tattered slip-on vans who can't seem to sit still. Hunter's patterns of movement were more predictable, but you were too intimidated by the muscular appearance of his legs and his large, broad-soled Etnies.

Logan slips his feet in and out of his shoes compulsively, and you think this offers the best chance for getting his attention. The next time he slips his foot out and rests it atop his shoe, you will dash towards his toes and beat on them with all your might, with the hope that you will get his attention so he can rescue you.

As you approach Logan, the smell eminating from his old shoes gets even more revolting. If his feet had been clean when he left his house this morning, they must've become coated in sweat as he walked to the bus stop. It was early September, and Summer still hadn't given way to Fall, so it was quite uncomfortably warm out. You finally reach the spot from which you plan to pounce. Logan's massive shoes bounce up and down on the dirty bus floor. It's funny that you are shrunken on a bus, because at your size, this 12 year old boy's shoes look like two massive white busses.

Logan doesn't make you wait long for your opportunity. He slides his foot out of his shoe and rests it on top. Now, just inches before your face lie Logan's long, tanned toes, glistening with sweat, and sprinkled with dust and dirt and lint--all the things that would be found caked in the toe section of an active young boy's shoes. He wiggles his toes gently, sending forward a vile cloud of foot oder that almost makes you lose your nerve. "How can a boy that size produce something so fierce?" you think. Oh well, you can't miss your opportunity, so you lurch forward, fists balled, ready to assault his two largest toes.

Your fists are just about to make contact with Logan's huge, slender toes, when he suddenly raises his foot up, preparing to start tapping it again. In the split second it takes him to raise his foot, you trip on his outsole, and land in the shadow of this massive--no--normal sized boy's sweaty foot sole. Before you can do anything, his foot is tapping away. Logan is unknowingly pummeling you between the canvas fabric of his shoes and the hot, clammy, sweat drenched flesh of his foot sole. Blow after blow, the front end of Logan's foot rises up a few inches, and then rushes back down to slap your face, stinging you like a wet cloth would.

After you've been smacked down dozens of times, Logan finally moves his foot and rests it on the side of his Vans shoe, his sole in contact with the bare floor of the bus. For many seconds you lie there on the top of the filthy canvassed sneaker of that 12 year old boy, lost in a stupor. You had been in your share of scuffs, but you’ve never endured such a cruel beating as that administered to you under Logan’s perfect bare foot. You know that Logan could resume the assault at any second, and you HAVE to move. You are beaten, but not broken, and you manage to roll off the side of the shoe and land on the floor of the bus, where you hope to regain your crushed confidence and make another attempt at contacting giant—no—normal sized Logan. You have to keep reminding yourself that you are the tiny one.

You only have a few seconds before Logan…

12411.content:
You are lying on the ground on the side of Logan's empty white Van sneaker. You know his bare foot is on the other side. You failed to get his attention, and made a mistake that nearly got you killed under the unforgiving foot of a 12 year old boy. You start to think about getting up, but before you do, Logan playfully turns his shoe over, still unaware of your presence. Your world goes dark. You try to get up and walk, but you are hemmed in by damn, rugged fabric on three sides. A small amount of light trickles in through a rip in the fabric a few inches away, you look up and see a giant Vans Logo, and realize that Logan turned his shoe over on top of you. You are stuck in the moist prison of Logan's old, well worn shoes. The smell that assails your nostrils is bad enough, you can bet it will singe your nose hairs off.

Suddenly, the ceiling--the dirty, ragged, damp sole of the sneaker--comes rushing down to meet you. You are slammed down between the floor of the bus and the heel fabric on the insole of Logan's shoes, which he has skated in for countless hours during his ownership. You realize that after he turned the shoe over, he must have rested his foot on top again.

"Yuck!" you think as you remember the mud ring you saw on the outsole of his shoes a few minutes earlier. The waffle sole of these Vans must be coated in mud and grime, which means Logan's silky smooth foot sole will now be coated in sweat AND fresh mud. This really wouldn't bother you normally, but if you don't escape from your dank prison, you could very well wind up trapped under that filthy, muddy foot sole for the rest of the day.

Suddenly, Logan removes his foot and flips the shoe right side up. What happens to you?

There are so many pairs of feet everywhere you look, that you are terrified to the point where you almost want to turn back and cover next to Logan's massive foot. But you know you can't. With this many kids on board, you know you have to be close to the school.

Maybe you should hold off on contacting somebody. These are, after all, middle-school students. Who knows what they would do to you if you were discovered. Should you wait on the bus and try to get the driver's attention after the kids leave?

Amid the cacaphony outside, you can hear Emily talking with Logan...they are planning to get together after school at her place. Her mom an dad are out of town until Wednesday.

You don't think much about it. By then, you plan to be out of this purse, in the care of a teacher, and on your way to some hospital or lab where they can fix you.

Meanwhile, there is just enough light for you to take in your surroundings. Whereas Logan's sweaty sneaker reeked of toe-jam and rancid sweat, Emily's purse had the strong smell of perfume. It was nearly overwhelming, but anything is better than Logan's Vans. You notice an iPhone with a pink and white cover, a set of house keys, LOTS of make-up and a few perfume bottles, some pepptermint flavored gum, pens, a $5 bill, two wrapped tampons, and a clean pair of panties.

124111111112.content:
You hear Emily take her first step toward the stall door. Her hard shoe sole creates a sharp tap. You know the next step she takes will land somewhere in your area, but you don't look back.

You can almost taste the bright florescent light streaming outside of the dark stall. You are about to emerge, into the light, when it all goes black.

Emily scored a direct hit. She wasn't even thinking about you anymore, too preoccupied with thoughts of her crush, Logan. How she couldn't wait to feel his hands on her body later that evening. She doesn't even hear the popping sound your skull makes. Instead, she thinks of the groaning noises Logan will make when he cums inside of her.

It happened so fast, you really didn't even have time to think about how massively heavy Emily was compared to you. Or how flat your body would be when she moved her foot.

Emily pauses for a moment, foot directly atop your decimated corpse, as she unlocks the stall door. Your dignity matters less than ever as your sticky remains cling to her shoe sole, being flattened repeatedly under the weight of a horny 13 year old girl. Your intestines drag behind her as she walks down the hallway amid the crush of students rushing to first period. They are caught under a jock, and what is left of you is finally peeled off of Emily's shoe. Over the next few minutes, the bloody pulp is ripped up and pulverized by the mass of uncaring middle schoolers. There is nothing left to recover, and what was once your body is now nothing more than grime caught in the filthy treads of several dozen chilren.
